mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Planning the New Season", "Shop Talk", "Gavel & Key", "27 Hours of S/D", "1981 National S/D Convention", "1980-1981 Square Dance Directory", "Viewer-Doer Flyer", "Experimental Notes", "Walk Thru Material", and "Meet Our Advertisers". This edition also includes the regular features entitled "As I See It", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On the Record", "Current Releases", "Square Dance Date Book", "Fashion Feature", and "National Convention".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
